Class BaseHttpRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.nio.protocol.SimpleNHttpRequestHandler
      marytts.server.http.BaseHttpRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.http.nio.protocol.NHttpRequestHandler, org.apache.http.protocol.HttpRequestHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataRequestHandler, FileDataRequestHandler, FileRequestHandler, InfoRequestHandler, PerceptionRequestHandler, StoreRatingRequestHandler, SynthesisRequestHandler, UtterancePlayRequestHandler
public abstract class BaseHttpRequestHandler
extends org.apache.http.nio.protocol.SimpleNHttpRequestHandler
implements org.apache.http.protocol.HttpRequestHandler

Provides baseline functionality to process http requests to the Mary server.

Author:
Oytun Türk, Marc Schr√∂der

getVocalizations

public java.lang.String getVocalizations(java.lang.String voiceName)
For the voice with the given name, return the list of vocalizations supported by this voice, one vocalization per line. These values can be used in the "name" attribute of the vocalization tag.

Parameters:
voiceName -
Returns:
the list of vocalizations, or the empty string if the voice does not support vocalizations.
